short_description: the leather solution is a furniture repair & reconditioning services company based in town of minisink, new york, united states.
long_description: the founders of the leather solution started doing leather repair for a company called "new life service company". a vinyl repair company founded as a church work project in the late 70's that grew to having representatives all around the world doing vinyl & leather repair for the auto industry, while preaching the gospel of jesus christ. in 1986 3 managers left the new life service co. to form a company dedicated to leather furniture repair & restoration. we worked originally for the design showrooms in new york city. these showrooms are not open to the general public only to architects & designers and their customers. in 1987 we opened 6 new locations and over the next few years we expanded to 18 locations centered around the design showrooms across the usa. today, we continue to service these markets and the consumers who purchase leather furniture for their homes, offices autos and aircraft. we designed the first water based leather finish system for after market repairs and pioneered the idea of successfully restoring & refinishing older worn, faded and stained leather furniture.
business_tags: leather care | professional services | leather garments | leather interiors | leather repairs | leather jackets | leather furniture | leather product | leather furniture repair | motorcycle leather jackets | leather furniture cleaning | repair & restoration | leather unit | sofas & love seats | leather accessories | leather cleaning | leather coats | casual dress | suede and leather | leather cases | leather bags | stain protectant | restorative services | beauty treatments | leather care products | vinyl repair | aircraft interior | jet aircraft | the gospel of jesus christ | independent testing | body oils | drinks & foods | corporate offices | retail furniture | architects design | design showroom | website designing | store room | repair services | facilities management | home / office
generated_description: the leather solution, legally known as the leather solution inc., based in baldwin, new york, specializes in the cleaning and repair of damaged, faded, and stained leather furniture and clothing. established in 1980, the company provides professional leather care and repair services across the united states. their offerings include repairing holes, cuts, scrapes, and stains, as well as complete refurbishing of worn and faded leather furniture. the leather solution also develops and produces leather care products, including cleaners, conditioners, and repair compounds. they serve residential consumers, corporate offices, and retail and designer showrooms, ensuring that leather remains in excellent condition for extended use.
